description: Ethereumcash is a cryptocurrency that was created in order to help promote day-to-day use of cryptocurrencies. It is called EthereumCash because it is built on top of the ethereum platform and aims to replace ether as a medium of exchange (note: not to replace ether entirely). It is a coin that has the sole purpose of being traded between consumers and merchants in order to buy products in a swift and easy manner.
name: ethereumcash
